T.Sandbox Class

Defined in: /home/cbuehler/Documents/Development/terrificjs/dist/terrific.js:330
Module: T

The sandbox is used as a central point to get resources from, add modules etc. It is shared between all modules.

Constructor

  • application
  • config

(
  • modules
)
Sandbox

Defined in /home/cbuehler/Documents/Development/terrificjs/dist/terrific.js:395

Removes a module by module instances. This stops and unregisters a module through a module instance.

Parameters:

    A collection of module to remove | Node context to look for registered modules in.
